author: StylishThemes
name: GitHub Custom Fonts
Google - Clean Dark

usercssData.name: Google - Clean Dark
usercssData.author: Seishiin
usercssData.description:
A dark and sleek theme for googleSupports:
  • Search
  • Translator
  • Calendar
  • Drive
  • Docs
  • Photos
  • Scholar
  • Books
  • Shopping
  • News
  • Keep
  • Play
Note: Gmail has a built-in dark themeFound a bug? Tell me in the comment section below! But be specific and provide a screenshot if you can.After the bug you have submitted has been fixed, please consider changing your rating to a positive one. Thanks.
